name: The DVI Group
tag_list: promotion, sales-training, event-video, training-video, instructional-video, web-video2d-animation, 3d-animation, post-production, visual-effect, s-vfx-animation, video-production, motion-graphics, creative, video, production, agency, film, marketing, adv
overview:
The DVI Group, is a creative video production agency

About The DVI Group - Established in 2000, DVI is changing the way its’ clients communicate with their customers. With superior creative services and technical expertise, the award winning, Atlanta-based creative video agency maintains an innovative approach to business and an unwavering focus on customer satisfaction. DVI offers a broad range of creative services and specializes in video production, interactive media services, digital signage, mobile media and streaming high definition media.

Our company motto is Make it Better, and we apply it to every aspect of video production. We make it better for you when you are deciding between video production companies by guiding you through the process and letting you know what to expect. We make it better for you during production by communicating clearly, staying in budget, and staying on schedule. The final product? Well, with our team’s expertise across production and post-production (including motion graphics, 2D animation, 3D animation, and visual effects), you can be sure we’ll make that better too.

At the heart of it all is this principle: Your needs and your customers are the foundation of every company video we produce, so when we tell you we’re going to make it better, we’re not just talking about your video, we’re talking about your business.
